org.activiti.explorer.ui.form

接口 FormPropertyRenderer

  • 所有超级接口:
    Serializable
    所有已知实现类:
    AbstractFormPropertyRenderer, BooleanFormPropertyRenderer, DateFormPropertyRenderer, DoubleFormPropertyRenderer, EnumFormPropertyRenderer, LongFormPropertyRenderer, MonthFormPropertyRenderer, ProcessDefinitionFormPropertyRenderer, StringFormPropertyRenderer, UserFormPropertyRenderer

    public interface FormPropertyRenderer
extends Serializable
    Interface for rendering a FormProperty of a certain type in the Vaadin UI.
    作者:
    Frederik Heremans

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      String getFieldValue(FormProperty formProperty, com.vaadin.ui.Field field)
      Extract the string representation of the value set in the field, for the given form property.
      com.vaadin.ui.Form getForm()
      Get the Vaadin form that contains this renderer
      Class<? extends FormType> getFormType()
      The form type this renderer should be used for.
      com.vaadin.ui.Field getPropertyField(FormProperty formProperty)
      The component to show for the given form-property.
      String getPropertyLabel(FormProperty formProperty)
      The label to use for the form-property.
      void setForm(com.vaadin.ui.Form p_form)
      Set the Vaadin form that contains this renderer

    • 方法详细资料

      • getFormType

        Class<? extends FormType> getFormType()
        The form type this renderer should be used for.

      • getPropertyField

        com.vaadin.ui.Field getPropertyField(FormProperty formProperty)
        The component to show for the given form-property. Return null if the form-property (and it's label) shouldn't be rendered.

      • getPropertyLabel

        String getPropertyLabel(FormProperty formProperty)
        The label to use for the form-property.

      • getFieldValue

        String getFieldValue(FormProperty formProperty,
                     com.vaadin.ui.Field field)
        Extract the string representation of the value set in the field, for the given form property. This value is used as form property value when submitting the (start)form to activiti. The field is the one created by getPropertyField(FormProperty).

      • getForm

        com.vaadin.ui.Form getForm()
        Get the Vaadin form that contains this renderer

      • setForm

        void setForm(com.vaadin.ui.Form p_form)
        Set the Vaadin form that contains this renderer
